name: Amit Mehta
bio: I'm a workflow automation expert with 15+ years in IT industry. I build smart, scalable n8n workflows for AI automation, marketing, CRM, and SaaS integrations. My focus is on simplifying business processes with tools like OpenAI, WhatsApp, Gmail, and Airtable. I help teams and solopreneurs automate smarter, reduce manual tasks, and grow fasterâ€”one workflow at a time.
